body.name: Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razor, The Emperor MEIJI by VIKINGS BLADE, Short & Fat Handle, Solid Brass, Butterfly Twist-To-Open, Eco Friendly, Luxury Case. Smooth, Close, Clean Shaving Razor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 44 mins
features: SMALL BUSINESS: This product is from a small family business brand. Support small

SOLVING Your Problems: For half a decade, this sustainable razor "the Emperor Meiji" has been helping the everyday Amazon customer solve the nuisance of razor burn, boring shaving chores and SAVING significant money on expensive and wasteful disposable cartridges
SMOOTH and CLEAN: Specifically, this razor has been engineered and patented to significantly reduce razor burn and provide you a Smooth, Close, Clean shave. Suitable for ALL Genders

ALL-IN-ONE: Adjustable from extra mild to ultra aggressive, HEFTY Short handle (3.75") with a rattling end-tip to drain trapped water. A straight bar for sensitive areas & a scalloped bar for normal areas. Thus, suitable for ALL Hair & Skin types and ALL GENDERS

CONTENT: 1 Emperor 'Meiji' razor handle + Luxury case only. Does NOT come with blades to prevent rash from blade unsuitability. Please buy your double edge blades separately and see which brand suits your hair/skin the best
PERFECT Gift for that special person on all occasions: Christmas, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cool Razor - great for beginners/new to safety razors
reviews.reviewText: This is a great entry-level razor, especially at the sub-$50 price point. Like most razors at this level, this one does a fine job and is made nicely. But, you MUST open it up and remove the blade after use so it can dry out. Many of these razors can rust out - even if they are anodized or coated like this one.Most people reading this are already into safety razors, so I'll try to describe this in relation to other products.It looks cool and I like the pseudo-Japanese design queues. The handle is textured and easy to grip - I never have to worry about dropping it in the shower. It's a butterfly, so that's a thing if it matters to you. I've owned several adjustables and this one does well, again - great for someone getting into this at such a price point. I started at a 1 and worked my way up. By 3 with a Derby blade, it didn't really perform as well as I like. But that's just my personal experience - everybody's different.Being an adjustable, this is a great razor for new people to experiment with aggression and see what they like best. I think it's great as a gift for your kids first razor or a novelty for a husband. If you already own a few adjustables - you know exactly what you're getting. Past that, it's all personal preference.Again, at sub-$50 you can't go wrong with what you get here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a replacement for the handle that I had been using from another brand for years. I love the look of this razor first of all. Beautiful right out of the box and the butterfly closure is a really cool touch. I use the side without the nubs as it provides this smoothest one pass that gets every hair with the most minimal of effort very quickly. The look of the razor is awesome and it does a fantastic job. Extremely happy with it and worth of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for beginners
reviews.reviewText: First, this razor is NOT for beginners. This razor bounces between a 3 star and a 5 star based on blades, skill and concentration. What I do like, is this razor has heft to it. It feels so nice in the hand. Beautiful craftsmanship in the metal and contrasting colors. I have been using this razor since April 2023, not for every shave, but a lot of them. At first, I kept getting razor burn and TONS of nicks and cuts. I really enjoy shaving but this razor made it hard to love. One day I decided to give this razor the best chance it could have. I usually use the sample blades you get when you buy a razor (I have a ton of them) and this time I decided to use a good quality blade. I also found that this razor needs a SUPER light touch, let the blade do the work. I have been using this razor for consecutive shaves and it gets better every time. Finally, I decided to write this review. With practice and some understanding of this razor it has become one of my favorite razors and now I can't wait to use it. I use it on setting #3 with a quality blade. I look forward to seeing what else Vikings Blade has to offer, I would love to try them all and leave my reviews!... Maybe a discount??? 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid and well made adjustable safety razor
reviews.reviewText: Early days, but I am most satisfied with the product received, it has a good weight and with its aggressiveness so easily adjustable via the collar dial one is assured a satisfying and close shave, no nicks, no cuts, no rash. I am most pleased with my purchase and getting it sent to the UK was both quick and easy. It cost a bit more than the long handled version available here, but I wanted the short handled version and so had to order via the US site. Would thoroughly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Typical Old School Razor
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s adjustable and heavy. It’s practical, elegant and well-priced. Don’t expect as smooth a shave as disposable two and three blade razors. Still, nothing beats the sturdiness and easy cleaning of these razors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got the product late but it’s understandable because of the amount of snowfall the United States has gotten. I first used it with some of my blades and it really works well I love that it is adjustable, I love the design and it does great on my skin. Would recommend this to people with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow what an exceptional shaver above and beyond my expectations absolutely positively value for the money can I go wrong with this shaver.

Good heft, great adjustability, easy to load! Nice close shave with lots of customization. One of the best on the market. Found it just a touch too short for my needs but an excellent product. Bought the Emperor Augustus for the longer handle but will keep the Meiji for my travel needs.

la verdad es mi primera maquina de afeitar que me compro, estéticamente es hermosa sus colores llaman la atención es pesada y se siente bien construida es la primera ves que me rasuro con una navaja de este tipo,lo que si trae puesta una navaja de la marca pero ami me irrito micho la piel le puse una Astra Platinum Double Edge y la verdad rasuro muy padre (solo la he usado 5 veces pero hasta ahorita todo bien )

Im Vergleich zu „billigeren“ Hobeln wie. Merkur, Mühle usw (jedoch auch Modelle ohne verstellbare Klinge ) oder auch den wirklich preiswerten und tolle Gillette Classic Hobel - wirklich um einiges besser !Liegt super in der Hand, Gewicht, Größe und oberflächentextur für mich wirklich sehr angenehm.Lässt sich auch gut reinigen ‚x sehr glatte Oberflächen in der „spannvorrichtung““
There's better gear out there for this price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Premium segment product for the discerning
reviews.reviewText: Have used quite a few razors and different types, but this is the best I have used so far...perfectly weighted and balanced, and glides smoothly with a Gillette 7 o'clock super platinum blade, I use adjustment points 2 and 3, and like the close shave.
